physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal appearance of the pinnae, canals, and tympanic membranes. Documented bilateral symmetric moderate to severe sensorineural hearing loss, more pronounced in higher frequencies.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially recommended for a hearing aid evaluation two years ago but did not proceed. After further recommendation and family pressure, she agreed to a hearing aid fitting, indicating a change in management.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: After two months post-fitting, Mrs N felt no improvement in quality of life with the hearing aid. Reported issues regarding comfort and function.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Following continuous dissatisfaction, she underwent a new fitting for a hearing aid that allowed her to control the volume, ultimately leading to satisfaction with its use in social settings.
